definition: to seek one's livelihood/to work to support oneself/to earn a living
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Today one-third of the people on Greenland earn their living in the fishing industry.
sentences.chinese: 今天格陵蘭島上有三分之一的人在捕魚業中謀生。

sentences.english: They began to eam their living when they were very young.
sentences.chinese: 他們很年輕的時候，就開始謀生了。

sentences.english: Some have to hide eking out a living for decades.
sentences.chinese: 有些老華僑甚至躲藏了數十年，偷偷謀生。

sentences.english: So William had to earn his own living.
The blind young man makes a living by singing .
sentences.chinese: 那位瞎眼年輕人通過賣唱來謀生。

sentences.english: You have to learn the tricks of the trade if you make your own living.
sentences.chinese: 如果自己謀生的話，你必須學這行生意的訣竅。

sentences.english: They are all volunteers with other rent-paying jobs.
sentences.chinese: 這些人人都是志願者，都有其他謀生的工作。

sentences.english: And for some people, gardening has provided a new career path.
sentences.chinese: 對一些人來說，園藝爲他們提供了一條新的謀生之道。

sentences.english: The necessity of making a living disentranced him from his gamble.
sentences.chinese: 謀生的必要使他醒悟，不再賭博了。

sentences.english: Shafer is now making money by designing miniature homes.
sentences.chinese: 他現在靠爲別人設計小型房屋而謀生。

sentences.english: Mrs. Jones makes a living by boarding students.
sentences.chinese: 瓊斯太太靠給學生們包飯謀生。

sentences.english: First of all, it should be of real service to my fellowmen and not merely enable me to earn a living.
sentences.chinese: 首先應該真正的爲同胞服務，而不僅使我可以謀生。

sentences.english: He went out to make a living when young, and has made a lot of achievements with great independence.
sentences.chinese: 他少年出外謀生，獨立支持，做了許多大事。

sentences.english: Routine office work is my bread and butter.
sentences.chinese: 日常的辦公室工作是我的謀生之道。

sentences.english: After high school, I kicked around a few jobs with no hope of a career.
sentences.chinese: 高中畢業以後，我四處謀生，事業上毫無希望。

sentences.english: Today one-three of the people on Greenland earn their living in the fishing inductry.
sentences.chinese: 三分之一的格陵島的人靠在魚產工作謀生。

definition: to trade/to carry out commercial activities/in business
to seek knowledge/to study/to attend college
to leave one's homeplace (to find work, flee disaster etc)
to leave home to make one's way in the world/to leave the life one knows to seek success
to read a book/to study/to attend school
to return to one's home town
to leave one's native place, esp. against one's will (idiom)
to learn a skill or art
